name: Creamy Chicken Tortilla Bake
author: Shay
summary: An easy recipe to make in the microwave or oven. Absolutely delicious.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
2 (4 ounce) cans chopped green chiles, drained
1 (8 ounce) package shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir onion until tender and translucent, about 5 minutes
Mix in cream of chicken soup, sour cream, and cumin
Grease a 9x12-inch microwave-safe baking dish and place 4 tortillas in a layer into the bottom of the dish
Top with 1 can green chilies, half the chicken, half the soup mix, half the Cheddar cheese, and half the Monterey Jack cheese
Repeat layers, ending with Monterey Jack cheese
Cook in microwave oven on high until the casserole is bubbling and the cheese topping is melted, about 10 minutes
